column4: i get filcker when i run opengl apps with compiz, i have an ATI card is this problem fixeed now?
If you are using karmic and the open source drivers via the xorg-edgers repo, booting with radeon.modeset=1 will enable kms and fix the issue
You dont have to turn off compiz if you use the open source radeon driver and kms
